programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: After a daring escape from the motel, Seth leads the Fullers' RV to the border crossing; an irrational fear takes hold of Richie; Jacob Fuller takes control of a volatile situation, determined to get his children safely across the border.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: Gonzalez makes the crossing into Mexico, where he is captured by the cartel; at the bar, Seth is sure they have made a mistake but Richie disagrees; Gonzalez escapes and makes it to the bar.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: Gecko brothers and the Fuller family sit down to watch the performance of a lifetime as Santanico Pandemonium takes the stage. But when Ranger Freddie Gonzalez shows up to exact revenge, the show takes an unexpectedly savage turn.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: Bobby Kalinowski (Rob Van Dam), a retired Navy SEAL, has to save his kidnapped daughter with help from a former teammate (Dave Batista).

programme.title: Standoff
programme.desc: Armed with a shotgun and one bullet, a war veteran (Thomas Jane) tries to protect a young murder witness from a ruthless assassin (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: A monstrous storm devastates Los Angeles, leaving the streets flooded and infested with sharks.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gritton and her guests Janel SantaCruz and Dan Mills list their top 5 arcade games.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.desc: Danielle Perez and Danielle Radford list their Top 5 midnight snacks.

programme.title: Mega Piranha
programme.desc: A mutated strain of giant and ferocious Amazonian piranha escape from the jungle rivers and eat their way toward Florida.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A retired special operations soldier leads a team of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea to obtain mining rights from the indigenous population.

programme.title: Knock Off
programme.desc: Hong Kong business partners (Jean-Claude Van Damme, Rob Schneider) tangle with villains smuggling miniature explosive devices.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The living dead regroup above while humans (Lori Cardille, Terry Alexander, Joseph Pilato) sweat it out below in a Florida missile silo.

programme.title: Legionnaire
programme.desc: A 1920s playboy (Jean-Claude Van Damme) returns from a stint in the French Foreign Legion to reclaim his lover, a mobster's mistress.

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: Bobby Kalinowski (Rob Van Dam), a retired Navy SEAL, has to save his kidnapped daughter with help from a former teammate (Dave Batista).

programme.title: Firewalker
programme.desc: Two guys (Chuck Norris, Louis Gossett Jr.) and a girl (Melody Anderson) brave jungle hazards to find an Aztec temple filled with gold.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: An American kickboxer (Jean-Claude Van Damme) trains with an Asian master (Dennis Chan) to avenge his crippled brother (Dennis Alexio) in Thailand.

programme.title: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back
programme.desc: Asian villains pick a fight with a Los Angeles kickboxer (Sasha Mitchell) whose brother beat them in Bangkok.
